event.title: Clock
event.name: Cycles
event.description: The number of core clock cycles

event.title: Software
event.name: Increment
event.description: Incremented only on writes to the Software Increment Register

event.title: Cache
event.name: Instruction refill
event.description: Instruction fetch that causes a refill of at least the level of instruction or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Inst TLB refill
event.description: Instruction fetch that causes a TLB refill of at least the level of TLB closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data refill
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a refill of at least the level of data or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data access
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a cache access to at least the level of data or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data TLB refill
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a TLB refill of at least the level of TLB closest to the processor

event.title: Instruction
event.name: CONTEXTIDR
event.description: Instruction that writes to the CONTEXTIDR architecturally executed

event.title: Program Counter
event.name: SW change
event.description: Software change of PC, except by an exception, architecturally executed

event.title: Branch
event.name: Procedure Return
event.description: Procedure return architecturally executed (not by exceptions)

event.title: Branch
event.name: Potential prediction
event.description: Branch or other change in program flow that could have been predicted by the branch prediction resources of the processor
